Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2008 07:30PM - edited Jan 14, 2008 07:34PM by betsy13 Yes I did have that happen to me....it seems there  was one "left behind" from near the original malignant cluster from my biopsy and lumpectomy and could only be seen with mag views in 6 month and 10 month mammo....they think it may be that it was in my scar and my tissue is very dense .....I really trust my BS and know that she saw it in my mag views, but the stereotactic bx mammo would not ID it so she couldn't go after it...short term follow up in 4 months still showed it unchanged, but also some new calcs in B breasts...of to B MRIs tomorrow (got it pushed up:) and Wed....saying some prayers (&keeping my fingers crossed) I can finally get off this roller coaster  Betsy
